feed.title: petermeissner
feed.subtitle: petermeissner: personal blog, stats, tech, and things between and beyond

entry.title: Up and Running
entry.content:
Finally I finished my search for a new framework to handle my personal webpage. You know something that would not involve too much semi-automatic pasting content into placeholders while all the time having it look like some second hand page from the late two-thousands.

I found it and I am happy so far: A Jekyll page with a simple but solid and elegant design by Niklas Buschmann.
entry.summary: Finally I finished my search for a new framework to handle my personal webpage. You know something that would not involve too much semi-automatic pasting content into placeholders while all the time having it look like some second hand page from the late two-thousands. I found it and I am happy so far: A Jekyll page with a simple but solid and elegant design by Niklas Buschmann.
